newsitem.title: USA: PC Quote names chief executive officer.
newsitem.headline: PC Quote names chief executive officer.

text.p: PC Quote Inc said it named Jim Porter as chief executive officer, reporting to the company's board of directors.

This position had previously been held by a committee consisting of Louis Morgan, chairman of PC Quote, John Hart, chairman of Physicians Insurance Co of Ohio, and Ronald Langley, chief executive officer of Physicians Insurance and a PC Quote board member.
PC Quote provides on-line stock and market quotes.

Most recently the president and chief executive officer of New Century Investment Research & Management Inc, Porter has previously served on the boards of directors of the Midwest Stock Exchange, the Pacific Stock Exchange and the Chicago Board Options Exchange.
